facts: Map: Block A (The main academic building) contains the Library (1st Floor) and the 24/7 C-Shop (Ground Floor).
Map: Block B (School of Law) is opposite the main football ground.
Map: Block C hosts the School of Management and the Times School of Media.
Map: The N and P blocks are located opposite each other, right beside the main auditorium.
Map: The main auditorium is also known as the 'German Hanger'.
Map: The 'Gobble' mess hall is located beside the D6 (Girls) and C11 (Boys) hostels.
Hostels: The boys' hostels are named C1 through C12.
Hostels: The girls' hostels are named D1 through D6.
Food: The main mess hall is named 'Gobble'.
Sports: The Sports Complex is located behind the hostel blocks.
Sports: Facilities include a swimming pool, indoor badminton court, basketball court, squash court, table tennis court, lawn tennis court, billiards, chess, and carrom.
